clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the symptomatic relief of nasal and non nasal symptoms of seasonal allergic rhinitis and perennial allergic rhinitis in patients 2 years of age and older FDA Label Also used for the symptomatic relief of chronic spontaneous urticaria in patients 2 years of age and older

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Rupatadine is an anti allergenic and acts to reduce allergic symptoms like urticaria rhinorrhea sneezing and itching FDA Label

incompatibilities.description: Rupatadine may decrease effectiveness of Benzylpenicilloyl polylysine as a diagnostic agent
The therapeutic efficacy of Betahistine can be decreased when used in combination with Rupatadine
